ValidationRule.description: Only a System Admin can uncheck the Do Not Contact box
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED( DoNotCall), DoNotCall = False,
$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",
$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator API",
$Profile.Name <> "Sales Data Steward" ,
$Profile.Name <> "Salesforce Support" ,
NOT( $Permission.DNC_Permissions_Set ) ,
NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name,"Referral")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only a System Administrator can uncheck a Do Not Contact
